response.overview: A father’s health scare changes his life, leading him to an extreme organic lifestyle in an effort to maintain control over his health. However, his strict routines and dietary restrictions create a rift with his son, who lives a healthy life but does not meet his father’s standards. Through conversations and self-reflection, the son attempts to bridge their divide, exploring the underlying fears and family dynamics driving their conflict. The film highlights the complex interplay between personal choices, family expectations and how fear can shape relationships in profound ways.
response.title: Alkaline
